The '''Music update''' was an update for ''[[Java Edition]]'' that added 17 new [[music]] tracks by ''Minecraft'' composer [[C418]], released on November 15, 2013.<ref name="release" /> 16 tracks had been previously released on the album ''[[Minecraft - Volume Beta]]'', and the 17th was a new original piece.

== Additions ==
* Four tracks that play at the [[Title Screen|title screen]]: "[[Mutation]]", "[[Moog City 2]]", "[[Beginning 2]]", and "[[Floating Trees]]".{{note|Added as <code>menu1.ogg</code>, <code>menu2.ogg</code>, <code>menu3.ogg</code>, and <code>menu4.ogg</code>}}
* Six tracks that play in [[Creative]] mode: "[[Biome Fest]]", "[[Blind Spots]]", "[[Haunt Muskie]]", "[[Aria Math]]", "[[Dreiton]]", and "[[Taswell]]".{{note|Added as <code>creative1.ogg</code>, <code>creative2.ogg</code>, <code>creative3.ogg</code>, <code>creative4.ogg</code>, <code>creative5.ogg</code>, and <code>creative6.ogg</code>}}
* Four tracks that play in [[the Nether]]: "[[Concrete Halls]]", "[[Dead Voxel]]", "[[Warmth]]", and "[[Ballad of the Cats]]".{{note|Added as <code>nether1.ogg</code>, <code>nether2.ogg</code>, <code>nether3.ogg</code>, and <code>nether4.ogg</code>}}
* One track that plays in [[the End]]: "[[The End (song)|The End]]".{{note|Added as <code>end.ogg</code>}}
* One track that plays during the [[Credit sequence|credits]]: "[[Alpha (song)|Alpha]]".{{note|Added as <code>credits.ogg</code>}}
* One track that plays during the fight with the [[Ender Dragon|ender dragon]]: "[[Boss (song)|Boss]]".
